# Function to

Change the unit of a value.

    x to unit     to(x, unit)

For matrices, the function is evaluated element wise.


### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`x` | Unit &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | 
`unit` | Unit &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | 

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
Unit &#124; Array &#124; Matrix | res
